name: the BFH experience
description:
The BFH Experience Simulator Summary

This very small game was made for an unofficial game-jam we organised in our class. It reflects the, at times, very frustrating and stressful process of ~studying~ in the form of a couple of small, silly minigames.

I've had fun making this, but a (Unity) bug I could not find for ages stole three years of my life, and spilled my cereal.

Credits

Thanks to my friends Tieu and Deniz for their likenesses, Mixkit for the audio, and the gods for the strength.
